name: desafio-api-qa
description: Automação de API para ServeRest com Postman e Newman

scripts.test:users: newman run collections/serverest-collection.json -e environments/serverest-environment.json --folder "Usuários" -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/html/users-report.html
scripts.test:login: newman run collections/serverest-collection.json -e environments/serverest-environment.json --folder "Login" -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/html/login-report.html
scripts.test:products: newman run collections/serverest-collection.json -e environments/serverest-environment.json --folder "Produtos" -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/html/products-report.html
scripts.test:carrinhos: newman run collections/serverest-collection.json -e environments/serverest-environment.json --folder "Carrinhos" -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/html/carrinhos-report.html
scripts.test:all: newman run collections/serverest-collection.json -e environments/serverest-environment.json -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/html/full-report.html
scripts.test:html: newman run collections/serverest-collection.json -e environments/serverest-environment.json -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/html/newman-report.html
scripts.test:ci: newman run collections/serverest-collection.json -e environments/serverest-environment.json -r htmlextra,cli,junit --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/html/ --reporter-junit-export reports/junit/test-results.xml
scripts.test:bdd: newman run collections/serverest-bdd-collection.json -e environments/serverest-environment.json -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/html/bdd-report.html

author: Maicon
